text: Gilson may refer to: ==Places== *Gilson, a hamlet in Warwickshire, England *Gilson, Illinois, a village in the United States *Gilson Butte in Utah, a United States rocket launching site ==Other uses== *Gilson (footballer, born 1991) *Gilson (name) *Gilson Trinidade de Jesus (born 1957), Brazilian Olympic basketball player known as Gilson *Gilson, a common type of pipette *Gilson College, a Seventh-day Adventist School on the outskirts of Melbourne, Australia *Gilson Brothers Co., a manufacturer of outdoor power equipment
title: Gilson (disambiguation)
